issue_title: [Security] TOCTOU race condition between exists() check and stat() call in load()
fix_summary: Eliminated TOCTOU race condition by combining exists() check and stat() call into a single try/except block. Instead of checking if file exists first then calling stat(), the fix directly calls stat() and catches FileNotFoundError, returning empty list when file doesn't exist.
risks: Minimal risk - the change is a simple refactoring that preserves existing behavior
